name: Onion Ring
description:
Try to knock your opponent out of the arena before you both grow so large you no longer fit in the arena!

Use WASD to Move Around, The character will look at the Mouse Cursor. To dash, use the SPACE bar in addition to one of the movement keys. Attack your opponent by using Left Mouse Button and Right Mouse Button. Alternating these attacks will keep your attacks strong! Bowls of rice will spawn around the arena, running over them will make your attacks more powerful. While you increase in power you’ll also increase in size.
